comments:

paths are resolved:

Unit tests were run before code was released.

traces.message: The workspace relative path of the virtual resource must match the real resource expected:</TestVirtualAPI/WebModule1/WebContent/WEB-INF> but was:</TestVirtualAPI>
The project relative path of the virtual resource must match the real resource expected:<WebModule1/WebContent/WEB-INF> but was:<null>
There should be exactly one Component resource with the source path "WebModule2/images".
There should be exactly one Component resource with the source path "NewWebModule/WebContent/META-INF".
